comment: Might not be.. Their Luxury SUVs parked right around the corner...
amr:
# ::snt Might not be.. Their Luxury SUVs parked right around the corner...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -)
      :snt2 (p2 / park-01
            :ARG1 (c / car-make
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "SUV")

                  :mod (l / luxury))

                  :mod (r / right))))
